strapiPost.title: Books Galore
strapiPost.content:
With virtual events, anything can be local! The Six Bridges Book Festival is virtual this year and starts today running until the end of the month.

  • From all over: The festival is free and presented by the Central Arkansas Library System. The festival is practically world-wide with 8 of the presenting authors calling in from other countries. 
  • More than speakers: In addition to the presenters, there will be writing workshops and competitions, an edible book contest, and a pet trick and costume contest in the spirit of Halloween. 

To register, or for more information on the festival, click HERE.
